name: Be a Hero!!!
description:
Shootem-up in space. You fly with the R-Type and the client, who is only sitting in his cockpit, flies under you in the Gradius-Spaceship. There are eight levels. You move your ship with the arrows on the right side.  Shooting is with pressing the fire-symbol on the left. In each level are 20 enemies flying from right to left, you fly in the opposite way.

Sometimes there come "1up", when you collect you get an extra-life.

When you collect a red circle your speed increases.
